verses.arabic: يس
verses.transliteration: Ya Sin
verses.translation: Ya, Sin

verses.arabic: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wa al-qur'ani al-hakim
verses.translation: By the wise Qur'an

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Innaka la-mina al-mursalin
verses.translation: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Ala siratin mustaqim
verses.translation: On a straight path

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Tanzila al-'azizi ar-rahim
verses.translation: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

verses.arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أُنذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Li-tundhira qawman ma undhira aba'uhum fa-hum ghafilun
verses.translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad haqqa al-qawlu 'ala aktharihim fa-hum la yu'minun
verses.translation: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe

verses.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Inna ja'alna fi a'naqihim aghlalan fa-hiya ila al-adhqani fa-hum muqmahun
verses.translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِن بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alna min bayni aydihim saddan wa min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynahum fa-hum la yubsirun
verses.translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see

verses.arabic: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa sawa'un 'alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhirhum la yu'minun
verses.translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Innama tundhiru mani ittaba'a adh-dhikra wa khashiya ar-rahmana bi-al-ghaybi fa-bashshirhu bi-maghfiratin wa ajrin karim
verses.translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyi al-mawta wa naktubu ma qaddamu wa atharahum wa kulla shay'ika humu al-khasirun
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register

verses.arabic: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa idrib lahum mathalan as-haba al-qaryati idh ja'aha al-mursalun
verses.translation: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Idh arsalna ilayhimu ithnayni fa-kaththabuhuma fa-'azzazna bi-thalithin fa-qalu inna ilaykum mursalun
verses.translation: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened [them] with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا مَا أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنزَلَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qalu ma antum illa basharun mithluna wa ma anzala ar-rahmanu min shay'in in antum illa takdhibun
verses.translation: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qalu rabbuna ya'lamu inna ilaykum la-mursalun
verses.translation: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma 'alayna illa al-balaghu al-mubin
verses.translation: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qalu inna tatyayarna bikum la-in lam tantahu la-narjumannakum wa la-yamassannakum minna 'adhabun alim
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qalu ta'irukum ma'akum a-in dhukkirtum bal antum qawmun musrifun
verses.translation: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."

verses.arabic: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'a min aqsa al-madinati rajulun yas'a qala ya qawmi ittabi'u al-mursalin
verses.translation: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers

verses.arabic: اتَّبِعُوا مَن لَّا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ittabi'u man la yas'alukum ajran wa hum muhtadun
verses.translation: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided

verses.arabic: وَمَا لِي لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma li la a'budu alladhi fatarani wa ilayhi turja'un
verses.translation: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?

verses.arabic: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.transliteration: A-attakhidhu min dunihi alihatan in yuridni ar-rahmanu bi-durrin la tughni 'anni shafa'atuhum shay'an wa la yunqidhun
verses.translation: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?

verses.arabic: إِنِّي إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Inni idhan lafi dalalin mubin
verses.translation: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error

verses.arabic: إِنِّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Inni amantu bi-rabbikum fa-isma'un
verses.translation: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

verses.arabic: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qila adkhuli al-jannah qala ya layta qawmi ya'lamun
verses.translation: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

verses.arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Bima ghafara li rabbi wa ja'alani mina al-mukramin
verses.translation: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."

verses.arabic: وَمَا أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِن بَعْدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma anzalna 'ala qawmihi min ba'dihi min jundin mina as-sama'i wa ma kunna munzilin
verses.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so

verses.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: In kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum khamidun
verses.translation: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished

verses.arabic: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ya hasratan 'ala al-'ibad ma ya'tihim min rasulin illa kanu bih yastahzi'un
verses.translation: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina al-quruni annahum ilayhim la yarji'un
verses.translation: Have they not seen how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?

verses.arabic: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa in kullun lamma jami'un ladayna muhdarun
verses.translation: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us

verses.arabic: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ayatun lahumu al-ardu al-maytatu ahyaynaha wa akhrajna minha habban fa-minhu ya'kulun
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alna fiha jannatin min nakhilin wa a'nabin wa fajjarna fiha mina al-'uyun
verses.translation: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs

verses.arabic: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Li-ya'kulu min thamarih wa ma 'amilathu aydihim a-fala yashkurun
verses.translation: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?

verses.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Subhana alladhi khalaqa al-azwaja kullah mimma tunbitu al-ardu wa min anfusihim wa mimma la ya'lamun
verses.translation: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know

verses.arabic: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ayatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu minhu an-nahara fa-idha hum muzlimun
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness

verses.arabic: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wa ash-shamsu tajri li-mustaqarrin laha dhalika taqdiru al-'azizi al-'alim
verses.translation: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

verses.arabic: وَالْقَمَرُ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wa al-qamaru qaddarnahu manazila hatta 'ada ka-al-'urjuni al-qadim
verses.translation: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk

verses.arabic: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.transliteration: La ash-shamsu yanbaghi laha an tudrika al-qamara wa la al-laylu sabiqu an-nahari wa kullun fi falakin yasbahun
verses.translation: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming

verses.arabic: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.transliteration: Wa ayatun lahum anna hamalna dhurriyyatahum fi al-fulki al-mashhun
verses.translation: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa khalaqna lahum mim mithlih ma yarkabun
verses.translation: And We created for them from that which they ride

verses.arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa in nasha' nughriqhum fala sarikha lahum wa la hum yunqadhun
verses.translation: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

verses.arabic: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Illa rahmatan minna wa mata'an ila hin
verses.translation: Except [by being granted] mercy from Us and provision for a time

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa idha qila lahumu ittaqu ma bayna aydikum wa ma khalfakum la'allakum turhamun
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Fear that which is before you and that which is behind you that you may receive mercy..."

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ آيَةٍ مِّنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma ta'tihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu 'anha mu'ridin
verses.translation: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالُوا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa idha qila lahum anfiqu mimma razaqakumu allahu qalu alladhina kafaru li-alladhina amanu a-nut'imu man law yasha'u allahu at'amahu in antum illa fi dalalin mubin
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqin
verses.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

verses.arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ma yanzuruna illa sayhatan wahidatan ta'khudhuhum wa hum yakhissimun
verses.translation: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fala yastati'una tawsiyatan wa la ila ahlihim yarji'un
verses.translation: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa nufikha fi as-suri fa-idha hum mina al-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansilun
verses.translation: And the Horn will be blown, and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten

verses.arabic: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَن بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qalu ya waylana man ba'athana min marqadina hadha ma wa'ada ar-rahmanu wa saddaqa al-mursalun
verses.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."

verses.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: In kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum jami'un ladayna muhdarun
verses.translation: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us

verses.arabic: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-al-yawma la tuzlamu nafsun shay'an wa la tujzawna illa ma kuntum ta'malun
verses.translation: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do

verses.arabic: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهِونَ
verses.transliteration: Inna as-haba al-jannati al-yawma fi shughulin fakihun
verses.translation: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be busy in [joyful] enjoyment

verses.arabic: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hum wa azwajuhum fi zilalin 'ala al-ara'iki muttaki'un
verses.translation: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Lahum fiha fakihatun wa lahum ma yadda'un
verses.translation: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

verses.arabic: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Salamun qawlan min rabbin rahim
verses.translation: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord

verses.arabic: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa imtazu al-yawma ayyuha al-mujrimun
verses.translation: [And O] you who have committed evil, stand apart [on] this Day

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Alam a'had ilaykum ya bani adama an la ta'budu ash-shaytana innahu lakum 'aduwwun mubin
verses.translation: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -

verses.arabic: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa an i'buduni hadha siratun mustaqim
verses.translation: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad adalla minkum jibillan kathiran a-falam takunu ta'qilun
verses.translation: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?

verses.arabic: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hadhihi jahannamu allati kuntum tu'adun
verses.translation: This is Hell, which you were promised

verses.arabic: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Islawha al-yawma bima kuntum takfurun
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny

verses.arabic: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Al-yawma nakhtimu 'ala afwahihim wa tukallimuna aydihim wa tashhadu arjuluhum bima kanu yaksibun
verses.translation: Today [on the Day of Judgment] We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law nasha'u latamasna 'ala a'yunihim fa-stabaqu as-sirata fa-anna yubsirun
verses.translation: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law nasha'u lamasakhnahum 'ala makanatihim fa-ma istata'u mudiyyan wa la yarji'un
verses.translation: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return

verses.arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man nu'ammirhu nunakkishu fi al-khalqi a-fala ya'qilun
verses.translation: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation, so will they not understand?

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma 'allamnahu ash-shi'ra wa ma yanbaghi lah in huwa illa dhikrun wa qur'anun mubin
verses.translation: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

verses.arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Li-yundhira man kana hayyan wa yahiqqa al-qawlu 'ala al-kafirin
verses.translation: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: A-walam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma 'amilat aydina an'aman fa-hum laha malikun
verses.translation: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?

verses.arabic: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa dhallalnaha lahum fa-minha rakubuhum wa minha ya'kulun
verses.translation: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat

verses.arabic: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lahum fiha manafi'u wa masharib a-fala yashkurun
verses.translation: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?

verses.arabic: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ittakhadhu min duni allahi alihatan la'allahum yunsarun
verses.translation: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: La yastati'una nasrahum wa hum lahum jundun muhdarun
verses.translation: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fala yahzunka qawluhum inna na'lamu ma yusirruna wa ma yu'linun
verses.translation: So let not their speech grieve you, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.transliteration: A-walam yara al-insanu anna khalaqnahu min nutfatin fa-idha huwa khasimun mubin
verses.translation: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?

verses.arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa daraba lana mathalan wa nasiya khalqah qala man yuhyi al-'izama wa hiya ramim
verses.translation: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qul yuhyiha alladhi ansha'aha awwala marratin wa huwa bi-kulli khalqin 'alim
verses.translation: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

verses.arabic: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Alladhi ja'ala lakum mina ash-shajari al-akhdari naran fa-idha antum minhu tuqidun
verses.translation: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite

verses.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُمْ ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.transliteration: A-wa laysa alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wa al-arda bi-qadirin 'ala an yakhluqa mithlahum bala wa huwa al-khallaqu al-'alim
verses.translation: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.transliteration: Innama amruhu idha arada shay'an an yaqula lahu kun fa-yakun
verses.translation: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is

verses.arabic: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-subhana alladhi bi-yadihi malakutu kulli shay'in wa ilayhi turja'un
verses.translation: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned
